page.title: 06SHOPPING IN LOCAL VILLAGES
page.content: Stibbington, Waternewton and Sutton contain no shops so all the residents of these villages must travel out of the village to do their shopping. Most people do their main shopping once a week, the majority travelling to nearby Orton Centre where the Rainbow supermarket is located. The small shops at Wansford village on the west side of the A1 are also used quite often. In Ailsworth there are several village shops and even the garage sells foodstuffs. Most people use the village shops three times a week,though some go there every day. Most people also do their main shopping once a week at Bretton Centre on the edge of Peterborough where there is a Sainsburys supermarket. Peterborough centre with its Queens- gate shopping centre is also used.
